attributes.action: stop Wirral Borough Council from closing our services and leisure facilities.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A list has been released stating the closure of many of Wirral's services.

Help support Wirral residents and give them the voice that they deserve and need.

rejection.details: Your title and petition should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement, about Government policy.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
